wikipedia_page.main: Patrick Joseph Gallacher (17 March 1881 – 8 April 1951) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as an outside forward in the Scottish League for Partick Thistle. He also played in the Southern League for Luton Town and in the Western League for Tottenham Hotspur.

response: *Pat Gallacher, Scottish footballer (Partick Thistle, Tottenham Hotspur, Luton Town)
